record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1919. Fifth Row: T. Eck and A. A. Stagg (coach); fourth row: V. Ames, S. G. Veazey, C. C. McWilliams, F. R. Schneberger, R. M. Moore, and M. G. Harding; third row: M. B. Harris, F. A. Long, J. B. Hall, and C. C. Jackson; second row: H. W. Kennedy, W. C. Gorgas, H. H. McCosh (captain), E. H. Moore, and G. C. Lewis; first row: P. W. Graham, E. C. Curtiss, S. H. Speer, and J. G. Guerin.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
